Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, the product is worth $1200000 to us. However, I am confident it holds an even greater value for you, as it is worth $1200000 to you as well. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1080000. This represents a significant saving of $120000 compared to our standard pricing, making it an attractive proposition for you. I trust that this offer aligns with your financial planning and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the growth of your business. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,080,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,080,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
